data.title: Tyler J. Horst Memorial 5K Run & Walk
meta_keywords: Tyler J. Horst Memorial 5K Run & Walk
data.meta_description: The Tyler J. Horst Memorial 5K Run & Walk is on Sunday August 25, 2024.
data.meta_site_name: Tyler J. Horst Memorial 5K Run & Walk
data.text:
The Tyler J. Horst Memorial Foundation and Bloomsburg University of Pennsylvania have come together to create a 5K run & 1-mile walk for the students and community to celebrate the life of BU Football Alumni player, Tyler Horst! In Tyler's memory, our hope is to bring the community together while raising funds for the BU Tyler Horst Nutritional Center.

Anyone is able to participate with the fee of $20 by mail or Venmo; $20 (+fee) online.

TJH Venmo: https://venmo.com/u/TylerJHorstMemorial-Foundation

Start Time: 9:00am EDT

Date: Sunday, August 25, 2024

Location: Pettit Athletic Complex (BU upper campus) 59 Pettit Way, Bloomsburg PA 17815

Online Price: $20.00 Race Fee + $2.20 SignUp Fee

Venmo Price: $20 - @tylerjhorstmemorial

Paying at the event: $20

If possible, please send an email to tylerhorstmemorial@gmail.com to notify that you will be paying the day of.

Competition 5K Awards:

1st, 2nd, & 3rd place fastest MALE participant

1st, 2nd, & 3rd place fastest FEMALE participant

1st, 2nd, & 3rd place to the team with the MOST participants (male team)

1st, 2nd, & 3rd place to the team with the MOST participants (female team)
